node.title: What is Peer-to-Peer and Why is it so important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements). They are distributed, though they may have elements of centralization and decentralization. And intelligence is not located at any center, but everywhere within the system.

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.

node.title: Why Anyone Should Consider Becoming A (ThreeFold) Farmer
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation is changing the way how "we" as a whole approach the internet and its underlying technology. We believe building the internet back from the ground up is the only way to dismantle the monster it has grown into – a polluting greed-machine that allows people’s data to be abused for money all while just being accessible to just half of the earth’s inhabitants.
